title: BOught a Skin in Cards discount, but discount Wasnt aplied help!
body: Hello i just bought Jhin Skin 1350 and it was supposed to be on discount with the cards of event... discount wasnt applied!

replies.body: i bought it with the supposed 40% discount at the time, but the transaction seemed kind of weird because no points were deducted at the moment, i logged off and went back in, then i noticed it charged me full price

I looked into this for you, and it does look like you purchased High Noon Jhin for full price instead of your personalized store discount of 40%.  Out of curiosity did you buy the skin through the normal store or your personalized profile?  Regardless, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can help you out with this!
